mapper.select: select reviewid as "reviewId", isbn as "isbn", userid as "userId", rating as "rating", content as "content", to_char(reviewdate, 'YY-MM-DD') as "reviewDate" from review where isbn = #{isbn}
mapper.insert: insert into review (reviewid, userid, rating, content, reviewdate, isbn) values (review_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{rating}, #{content}, to_date(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{isbn})
